AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) responsible for the new caller ID resource.

CallDelay.description: The number of seconds to delay before initiating the verification call. Can be an integer between `0` and `60`, inclusive. The default is `0`.

Extension.description: The digits to dial after connecting the verification call.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the new caller ID resource. It can be up to 64 characters long. The default value is a formatted version of the phone number.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number to verify in [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) format, which consists of a + followed by the country code and subscriber number.

StatusCallback.description: The URL we should call using the `status_callback_method` to send status information about the verification process to your application.

StatusCallbackMethod.description: The HTTP method we should use to call `status_callback`. Can be: `GET` or `POST`, and the default is `POST`.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) responsible for the Caller ID.
**call_sid**: The SID of the [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) the Caller ID is associated with.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**phone_number**: The phone number to verify in [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) format, which consists of a + followed by the country code and subscriber number.
**validation_code**: The 6 digit validation code that someone must enter to validate the Caller ID  when `phone_number` is called.
